channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Brown University shooting leaves students, community frustrated with official response
item.description: The effort to find a man who walked onto Brown University’s campus and shot nearly a dozen students in a crowded lecture hall has raised serious questions about the school’s security systems and the urgency of the investigation itself.

item.title: An aspiring neurosurgeon and a campus Republican died in the Brown campus shooting
Killings of Rob Reiner and his wife stun Hollywood as decision on charges for their son looms
